Texts.Chs: 一块祸的碎片物质突然撞击附近的行星，并开始感染它。 你一定要毁掉它，防止祸再次复活。 我把坐标发送到了你的SAIL。
Texts.Eng: A cluster of ruin material has suddenly hit a nearby planet and is starting to infect it. You should definitely destroy it to prevent the ruin from spreading without notice. I gave the coordinates for the world to your SAIL.

Texts.Chs: 回到位于^green;方舟前哨站^reset;的^orange;光一^reset;那里。
谢谢你毁掉这星球上的生物。 它肯定只会传播到无法摧毁整个受感染行星的程度。
Texts.Eng: Thanks for destroying the creature on that planet. It certainly would have spread to a point where it is impossible to destroy all of the infected planets.
